summary: Provides a set of dataclass‑based configuration objects that describe the full training and inference pipeline for punctuation and capitalization token‑classification models in the NeMo NLP framework, covering model architecture, language model integration, head definition, tokenizer, dataset parameters, multimodal lexical‑audio extensions, and experiment management.
business_intent: Allows developers and researchers to easily set up, customize, and launch punctuation and capitalization models for improving the readability of transcribed text, especially in speech‑to‑text applications, by supplying a unified, validated configuration schema.
